ygData.subject: Re: Reduced Taunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Probably a sign error in the taunt code, so when they adjusted it down it actually went up. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Feb 04/00, Mike.Langlois@... wrote:
>
> Had one of those weird AE Taunt things last night. Anyone else getting these
> since the Reduced Bard Hate patch?
>
> Ran out of lavastorm with 50 health. Couldn't even see a pixel on my health
> bar. Entered Nek and fired up the Hymn.
>
> Two players are killing a DE guard 30 feet from me, on the path. Guard spins
> around, runs down the path, across the zone entrance alcove,
> and cuts my head off.

Probably a sign error in the taunt code, so when they adjusted it down
it actually went up.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
